Html: So i have 3/3 survival of the fittest and I'm un-critable but RAWR is still telling to go for defense gems. I think I'm missing something really obvious but can anyone tell me what it is?
Defense provides miss and dodge still, not just uncrittability.
so extra defense would be better than a agility gem?
It's possible, yes, though that would be a rather extreme amount of dodge to get that much DR on it.
